archimate:Requirement.name: PA.2.2.5d: d) prevention of unauthorised information sharing (e.g. by using Data Leakage Prevention (DLP) features to restrict 'open-in' and copy/paste commands; by encrypting sensitive files; and by monitoring outbound email).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
